name: Project Maiden
description:
Project Maiden is a narrative focused, puzzle-platformer where you must lose your powers to progress.

This is the first game by Kevin Cole. It took two-ish years to make. He's really grateful to everyone who believed in his dumb little dream.

Featuring the music of Joe Kenneally, Claire Pettit, Math the Band, and datacats.

Get the Soundtrack on Bandcamp!

Follow @SuperTryStudios for updates.

Keyboard Controls!*
A - Use/Get
S - Stoneskin Power
D - Transmute Power
Space - Jump/Rockblock Power
E - Draw/Sheath Sword
Q - Draw/Holster Gun
Ctrl - Camera Zoom
Enter - Pause


Sword Controls!
A - Thrust
S - Parry
D - Heavy Swing
Left/Right - Lunge
Up - Walk
Down - Change direction.


Gun Controls!
A - Shoot (Hold)
D - Operate Bolt
Space - Aim

*Use a gamepad. It's way better.
